title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: Bug 17825ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When I choose the option SWT.MULTI in ControlExampleText, nothing happens.
EB: I hear a Windows 'ding' sound when I choose the option SWT.MULTI (the bell sound that indicates an incorrect action).
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open ControlExampleText. 
2. Choose the option SWT.MULTI. 
3. Notice the Windows 'ding' sound.
